product_description:
引进下一代吹风技术，T3 羽量轻便型 2i 吹风机配备有一个离子发生器，使干发的方法变得更健康，让您拥有健康亮丽的秀发。 为了帮助您获得最大效果，这款吹风机采用创新的 T3 天然电气石和 SoftAire 软风技术。

借助 SoftAire 软风技术，可以更快吹干您的秀发，降低对秀发的损伤，抚平毛躁，使秀发更加柔顺飘逸。 配备有天然电气石的美发工具，在受热时会散发出负离子和健康的红外线热能。 设有 2 档速度和 3 档温度，您可选择适合您的模式进行美发。 这款吹风机还配备有电气石锥形发梳，可帮助您塑造出更精美的发型。 -SA
name: 羽量轻便型 2i 吹风机（赠发梳）

product_description:
该Cloud Nine Iron受到美容行业的热烈欢迎 - 的确应当如此。 适用于所有类型的头发，利用先进的控温技术，让您塑造令人兴奋的众多造型，而不必使用灼人的高热。
无论是想顺滑、轻拂、卷曲或拉直头发 - 您可以在比预想更低的温度使用此Cloud Nine Iron。 以更低的温度获得美丽造型？ 头发损伤更小。 这是一款拥有令人难以置信功能的直发器。 从简单易用的温度表，到休眠模式和旋绕电源线，它拥有让您尽情塑造发型所需要的一切。 更重要的是，其独特的黑色面板每次使用均可添加光泽。
Cloud Nine Iron的独特功能包括：
name: Nine Iron

product_description:
T3 羽量轻便型迷你吹风机 粉色版可给您带来沙龙级的效果。 轻便但动力十足，折叠式的设计是您外出旅行的理想选择！因此，即便您出门在外，也能尽享完美的吹风体验。 多个温度和速度档位可供调节之用，冷风按钮可让您所设计的发型有专业级的效果。
荣获专利的天然碧玺石® 技术和独创的 SoftAire™ 柔风设计完美结合，有效抚平毛躁，让秀发更加柔亮，同时密封鳞片层，锁住水分。 专业设计的风扇可产生富有离子的风，通过小口径排气孔成锥形排出，从而通过大面积吹风快速吹干秀发。 适合各种发型和发质，负离子可有效防止静电，抚平毛躁，定型持久，使秀发柔顺易梳。
name: 羽量轻便型迷你吹风机——粉色版

product_description: 使用FOREO LUNA™ go ，一個功能全面、便於攜帶的面部清潔設備，為了提供專業的面部護理標準和一分鐘護理程序而設計。為敏感肌膚專門定制，面部清潔刷能有效激發更健康美觀的膚色；幫助肌膚更加淨透明亮。 結合T-聲波™脈動技術和特別定制的矽膠觸點，使得該設備能有效清潔肌膚並溫和祛除角質；柔軟、光滑無磨損的矽膠觸點能在任何敏感肌膚上進行溫和清潔、祛除污垢、油脂及化妝品殘留物，留給您淨透明亮肌膚。靈活並易於使用，矽膠“刷頭”衛生方便，更讓您的肌膚煥發年輕健康光彩。 高科技抗老模式的嵌入，清潔儀引導低頻脈衝使用於皺紋易發部位，幫助肌膚實現光滑緊緻效果。 100%防水使得該設備能在浴缸和淋浴間安全使用。隨機附送的旅行袋能保持它的清潔和方便使用。 T-聲波脈動™技術（每分鐘8000 T-聲波脈動™） 基於臨床試驗 能有效去除99.5%的污垢和油，加上彩妝殘留。 低過敏性。無鄰苯二甲酸鹽和雙酚A。 產品特性： 每次充電可使用高達30次。 1 脈衝密度。 超衛生。 完全防水，可在淋浴間使用。 針對特定肌膚類型。 無需更換刷頭。 2年有效保修和10年質量保證。
name: Luna Go - 敏感肌

product_description:
Clinically proven to permanently eliminate unwanted hair, the IluminageTOUCH Permanent Hair Remover is FDA-cleared for all skin tones and safe for use on the face and body. Developed with breakthrough, patented elōs technology that combines Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) and Radio Frequency ( RF), the tool allows you to achieve smooth, hair-free skin without pain. 
 With a process that lasts as little as thirty minutes, the device automatically glides and emits pulses of bright white flashes to indicate when treatment has started, and the elōs energy levels can be altered for a low, medium or high intensity removal process. The only in-home treatment that delivers permanent hair reduction. EN 
 Results: Up to 94% hair reduction in just 6 weeks, after only one series of treatments (7 treatments in 6 weeks). 
 Features: 
 Specifications:  Dimensions: H:11cm x W:18 ​​x L:18cm  Weight: 1kg
name: 永久除毛仪

product_description:
BaByliss 离子造型卷发吹风机让您实现沙龙级的效果，该品牌旨在通过卓越的品质打造高端时尚造型。 配备有 42 毫米的旋转式陶瓷卷发筒和两档速度，这种设计增加了发卷的卷度与弹性，将长发和短发锁定在不同的层次。 采用先进的离子技术可有效控制静电，抚平毛躁，这款卷发棒可让枯燥、幼弱头发变得浓密丝滑。
这款造型工具设有两档温度，一档适用于吹干秀发和低温塑形。 其他附加功能包括：冷风，可为您所打造的发型实现持久定型，达到专业级的效果；软齿多方向发梳，可梳顺您的秀发。 配备有保护盒，以供存储之用。 E.N.
name: 离子造型卷发吹风机（42 毫米）——黑色/粉色版

product_description:
Achieve bouncy, defined ringlets with the BaByliss Tight Curls Wand. Featuring a chic red design, the wand has an ultra slim 10mm ceramic coated barrel to help you create gorgeous lasting styles.
Suitable for all hair types, it offers super-fast heat up speeds up to 210°C with variable settings from 120°C to create the looks you want with ease. Set on a 2.5m salon-style swivel cord, it’s flexible and easy to use with an elongated barrel ideal for longer hair to creating concise, tight waves.
It automatically shuts off after a period of time without use and the integrated heat rest and provided heat mat protect surfaces from damage, plus it comes with a heat-resistant glove to help prevent minor burns.
Please Note: Supplied with a UK three pin plug.
name: Tight Curls Wand - Red

product_description: Firm and tighten your complexion with the Magnitone London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush, a powerful tool that delivers a deep pore-cleansing action for radiant, refined skin. Effectively exfoliates the skin's surface to eliminate excess oil, dead skin cells, dirt and impurities, whilst improving the absorption of moisturising and skincare products to take the 'dare' out of going bare. The soft brush is gentle to skin and the innovative, double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology combines energising sonic oscillations and electromagnetic pulsed vibrations to boost micro-circulation and tone skin for a plump appearance and healthy-looking glow. With a completely waterproof design, the brush features an on/off button, wireless USB charger and Pulselift™ Toning Mode for a feathery-soft, sixty second skin workout.
name: London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush - Rose Quartz

三个配件容易使用和更换，特别适合打造紧致螺旋卷发、沙滩卷和靓丽大卷。 每个直筒都装配有角蛋白和摩洛哥坚果油，以打造光滑无静电妆效，令秀发造型持久定型。 具有自动断电功能和3米可旋转插线，使您在舒适的家中就可以打造柔顺的沙龙式的造型。

product_description: 使用Babyliss Pro Ceramic Hot Brush (13mm)打造发廊级造型。 这款陶瓷涂层梳可助您打造卷发、空气感和发型，效果立竿见影。 采用陶瓷涂层热棒设计，令造型后的秀发保持柔软光滑。 防滑手柄和可旋转长插线让您在造型时得心应手、游刃有余。 可更换的软质梳毛延长了使用寿命。 适应不同电压，全球通用，让您能随时随地打造完美发型。

product_description:
Parlux Superturbo 3000 吹风机（黑色）经过人体工学设计，让吹发尽在您的掌控之下。 这款吹发机的气流高达69立方米/小时，采用1810瓦大功率，使用寿命很长，吹风机设有两档风速，四档温度，适合所有发质。
产品还配有两种风嘴，可根据造型调整替换，快速打造心仪造型。 吹风机重量为1公斤，配有3米的柔软插线，强韧耐用的外壳经得起时间的考验。 - L.M.
name: Superturbo 3000 吹风机（黑色）

product_description:
Transform the look of your skin with iluminage Youth Activator Facial Device, a professional strength beauty tool that delivers a facelift effect in the comfort of your own home.
Inspired by professional technology used by doctors, the easy-to-use, anti-ageing device helps to rebuild healthy collagen and reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines for a noticeably firmer, smoother-looking complexion.
How does it work?
The device utilises three different energy types to help lift, firm and smooth the appearance of wrinkles: Radio Frequency, Red Light and Infra-Red LED. The Red Light and Infra-Red LED work in synergy to smoothen the look of wrinkles and lines, whilst Radio Frequency delivers thermal energy into skin to encourage collagen and elastin production. Designed to be used in conjunction with Youth Activator Contouring Serum, which ensures the Radio Frequency is delivered deep into skin for maximum results.
Results?
After use, skin appears noticeably firmer with smoother wrinkles and more sculpted and toned-looking facial contours.
name: Youth Activator

product_description:
使用 Parlux Powerlight 385 Hair Dryer，实现彻底吹干。该品牌打造具备优异质量、性能和可靠性的专业工具。 这款吹风机配有 K-LAMINATION® 2150W 电机和内置消音器，安静而强效，能更快地吹干头发。
这款环保型吹风机无有害气体排放，拥有便利的 3 米线和符合人体工程学原理的手柄，可实现舒适和平衡。其轻巧、紧凑的设计融合了离子和陶瓷技术，以控制静电和毛躁，而不会剥离水分，令秀发顺滑、平静，易于打理。可根据需要调节多项温度及速度设置。冷风按钮可用于实现沙龙级效果。 E.N.
name: Powerlight 385 - Mint

product_description:
Parlux 3200 紧凑型电吹风，粉红色，当之无愧地成为当今市场上最广泛使用的专业吹风机。 通过配备革命性的K-复合电机，使其更轻、更耐用、功效更强大。
Parlux 3200 粉红色紧凑型电吹风，是美发沙龙中最受欢迎的一款，也适用于 日常家庭使用！ 配有专业交流电动机，能提供69立方米/小时的气流，这使得Parlux 3200 成为世界上最强大的紧凑型专业吹风机之一。
Parlux 3200紧凑型电吹风，功率极为强大，但只有490克重，长为20厘米，可降低较重吹风机的通病——操作疲劳。  所有 Parlux 专业吹风机都配备3米长的插线，经过精心打造的舒适手柄，让吹风机使用起来更易操作控制，达到完美平衡。 Parlux 传奇品牌，值得信赖。
name: 3200 紧凑型电吹风（粉红）

product_description:
使用 Wahl Deluxe Chrome Pro 插电式理发剪，在舒适的家中实现理发店级别的剪发效果。 采用高碳钢刀片，动力强劲，运行却极为安静，给您高效的剪发体验。
29 件套提供一系列工具帮助您在家中整理仪容，包括鼻毛修剪器和紧凑型修剪器，全面打理您的仪容。
name: Deluxe Chrome Pro 插电式理发剪

product_description:
利用 Braun的810面部脱毛器和清洁刷 告别肌肤缺陷；这是一款可以帮助您使用脱毛器从根本上去除面部毛发或使用面部清洁刷深入清洁肌肤毛孔的设备。 去除毛发和清洁时，该工顺滑、紧凑的设计可获得绝对的掌控和精确度。
脱毛器可以用来从下巴、唇部、前额和眉毛精确清除面部毛发，通过每秒200次的拔毛动作，脱毛器使得脱毛比手动镊子更彻底。 从根部清除毛发，从而令肌肤最长四周时间内无毛发。
只需将附件从脱毛器更换为清洁刷头即可开始毛孔深层清洁。 该清洁刷利用微振荡清洁肌肤并去除角质，帮助清除化妆品和杂质，令肌肤焕发活力，光彩照人。 该设备还100％防水，让您可以在淋浴时使用。

product_description:
了解 Iluminage 唯一一款能在家永久使用的脱毛器。
IluminageTOUCH Permanent Hair Reduction 经 FDA 批准适用于所有肤色并可安全地用于面部和身体。与专业的激光脱毛技术相比，这款产品让您可以控制不必要的毛发并提供很高的满意度，且只有一点或没有痛感。
该装置采用 elōs 技术，结合了光形态与射频技术，可以护理更多的肌肤类型，同时关机时间更短，安全性更高。 其光脉冲表明护理已经开始的时间，且可以改变能量级，实现低、中等或高强度的脱毛护理。
安全而独特的设计，用于脸颊线以下面部脱毛。 - K.N

重量：1kg。

10秒迅速加热和快速回热系统能在时间有限的情况下仍然保证持久定型，​​数码温度控制和不同的热量设置，令您能够对造型进行自定义设置。 卷发减少系统有效解决发丝乱飞问题，并能舒缓毛囊，使发型垂顺有光泽。 配有3米可旋转插线和玫瑰金边缘奢华外观设计。

product_description:
Reveal sleek and straight locks with the ikoo E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush. Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. The settings range from 150-230 °C, suitable for both fine and thick tresses. Automatically shutting off after 30 minutes, the styler is safe and simple to use.
Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.
name: E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush - Sugar Plum

product_description:
Babyliss是全球領先的個人護理電器製造商，研發出全球首創革命性專利技術自動捲髮器，一夾即時自動捲入剩餘髮絲，只需8秒後即變成浪漫捲發，塑造完美捲曲造型，效果驚艷、神奇！ 
全球獨家專利陶瓷自動捲髮筒，自動捲起秀發，配備特快加熱系統，瞬間加熱，塑造動感自然的捲發效果。 
方便自動：只需一click，即可自動捲曲；只需將一縷秀發（約3至5厘米左右）放入，合上造型器，秀發會自動捲入，聽到聲響後，打開造型器放開秀發，即可完成，方便使用。 
安全可靠：專利內嵌設計、自動斷電設計及自動蜂鳴功能，安全可靠。 
智能設計：3款智能設計，包括三段熱力設定（190度、210度及230度），塑造持久的捲曲效果；三段時間設定（零秒、8秒、10秒及12秒）與蜂鳴提示，可調節捲髮效果的大小；3種捲曲方向（右側、左側及自動），製造不同捲髮效果。 
快捷：只需八秒，即可造出完美捲髮。 
亮澤：專利陶瓷捲髮筒，提供修復功能，令秀發光澤亮麗。

product_description:
Parlux 3500超小巧離子吹風機-黑色 
 Parlux 超緊湊離子吹風機是Parlux 全系列最輕的吹風機，也是最緊湊的吹風機，全長只有17cm。 
 Parlux 3500 超緊湊陶瓷離子吹風機配備2000 瓦K-lamination 電動機，為吹風機提供難以置信的動力，但不增加重量。此技術意味著吹風輸出為73 立方米/時。  3500 陶瓷離子吹風機與標準超緊湊吹風機相同，但是額外的陶瓷離子意味著陶瓷和負離子的共同作用可在頭髮內部傳播熱量，但不會導致髮質乾燥，非常適合容易毛躁的頭髮。標配兩個集中吹嘴，便於吹乾和造型。 Parlux 專業吹風機使用一根三米長的電源線。

product_description: 该专业设计的扩散器可以让您的秀发更为充盈，让头发看起来更为卷曲，具有波浪感，专门用于Parlux POWERLIGHT 385吹风机。  只需将扩散器紧紧卡在吹风机的吹风口上就可开始使用。该产品采用耐热型塑料制造，并且具有先进的卡箍设计，因此在使用过程中绝不会发生脱落现象。 该扩散器简单易用，能均匀地将热风吹到整个秀发之中，从而可以全天保持秀发的造型。 - E.D

product_description: Firm and tighten your complexion with the Magnitone London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ Daily Cleansing Brush, a powerful tool that delivers a deep pore-cleansing action for radiant, refined skin. Effectively exfoliates the skin's surface to eliminate excess oil, dead skin cells, dirt and impurities, whilst improving the absorption of moisturising and skincare products to take the 'dare' out of going bare. The soft brush is gentle to skin and the innovative, double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology combines energising sonic oscillations and electromagnetic pulsed vibrations to boost micro-circulation and tone skin for a plump appearance and healthy-looking glow. With a completely waterproof design, the brush features an on/off button, wireless USB charger and Pulselift™ Toning Mode for a feathery-soft, sixty second skin workout.

product_description:
Add volume and waves to locks with the Universal Diffuser XXL Pro from Diva Professional Styling. Delivering an extra boost to your blow dry, the diffuser is uniquely designed to fit any hairdryer. Suitable for long, short, thick or thin barrels, the universal diffuser boasts a soft grip that will hold it into place securely.
The diffuser is crafted with an extra deep, XXL bowl, designed for maximum hair capture. Soft rubber tips deliver volume and lift at the roots of hair, resulting in locks that look thicker, full bodied and volumised.
name: Professional Styling Universal Diffuser XXL Pro

product_description:
Magnitone London BareFaced Vibra-Sonic™ 敏感性肌肤清洁刷是一款强劲的洁面工具，具有深层清洁毛孔的功能，让您的肌肤紧致细腻，荣光焕发。 这款产品可在有效祛除角质、多余油脂、污物、杂质和坏死肌肤细胞的同时，提高肌肤吸收水分和护肤品的能力，达到让您裸妆就可以出门的效果。
柔软的刷毛非常温和，创新型的双重获奖 Vibra-Sonic™ 技术结合充满活力声波震动和电磁脉动震动，可促进微循环，让您拥有健康、清爽、丰盈的肌肤。 这款洁面刷采用全封闭式的防水设计，配备有开关按钮、无线 USB 充电器和 Pulselift™ 爽肤模式（让您的肌肤如羽毛般柔软），60 秒肌肤锻炼模式。

product_description:
Reverse visible signs of ageing with the Talika Time Control Anti-Ageing Cosmetic Instrument for Eyes Contouring.
Developed utilising extensive aerospace research, this is a light therapy device that has been specifically designed for use around the delicate eye area.
The patented ionotherapy system emits two wavelengths (590 and 630nm) of orange and red lights with imperceptible micro-currents that work in synergy to stimulate the fibrolasts, replenish natural collagen production and combat everyday micro-inflammations that accelerate the ageing process.  
Offering precise and targeted treatment, micro-vibrations stimulate cellular renewal, with the instrument seeking to smooth the appearance of wrinkles, alleviate the look of dark circles and combat puffiness without causing irritation or discomfort. Suitable for daily use, the handheld device leaves the eye contour feeling firmer and more refined with visible results after as little as two weeks.
name: Time Control Anti-Ageing Cosmetic Instrument for Eyes Contouring

product_description:

* Slendertone AB环带必须遵循说明书中所述的准则使用。 为了达到最佳效果，我们建议您使用Slendertone环带结合正常、健康的饮食和锻炼。
所有Slendertone产品均经过严格的临床试验。 Slendertone Abs S7经临床证明使用4周内腹部变得紧实平坦：
*临床试验由拉克罗斯威斯康辛大学John Porcari博士实施。 弯曲和行走（阿尔斯特大学）。

product_description:
Tria Hair Removal 激光脱毛器4X令肌肤肉嫩光滑，这是一款经临床验证的无绳脱毛器，可在短短3个月内（2次治疗）去除多达70%的多余毛发。

使您获得柔嫩、光滑的皮肤，并有长久的效果。
2-3个月的治疗后，会长出更柔顺、更细的头发。 治疗3个月后，已停用的毛囊不会再长出头发。 继续按需要使用touchups。
产品特点： 
脱毛安全而容易
效果永久。
经临床验证。
经FDA批准的激光技术。
无绳操控。
LED显示屏。
30分钟电池寿命。
易握手柄。

该专利旋转盘与氧化铝晶体去除死皮细胞并柔滑肌肤，无需人工擦洗，可减少细纹、皱纹、瑕疵和毛孔粗大。 拥有四级去角质盘和两种速度设置，该工具可刺激细胞再生，均匀肤色和肤质，提高护肤品功效。 E.N.

product_description: 黑色大力士385 輕型吹風機體態輕盈，功能強大，採用大力士系列吹風機系列產品同樣的知名生態環保技術，比同系列產品體型更小，噪音更小。該型號每小時氣流達79 立方米，具備三米長電纜和精心製作的手柄，符合人體工學的設計確保在做造型時實現完美平衡。此外，內置靜音器和對無有害氣體排放的承諾也是一大亮點，該款令人稱讚的型號融入陶瓷和離子技術，雖然使用熱量，也能夠有效保濕，令頭髮閃耀順滑。 - ED

Braun 推出 7561 Silk-Épil 7 脱毛器；这是一种无绳干湿脱毛器，可进行彻底脱毛，令肌肤如丝般柔软。 专为在温水中脱毛而设计，以改善血液循环，降低肌肤敏感度，该脱毛器为防水设备，可经受水洗。

product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

product_description:
Reveal sleek and straight locks with the ikoo E-Styler Hair Straightening Brush. Designed to simultaneously brush and straighten hair, the styler is constructed with 37 individual ceramic plates, which ensure even heat application to hair without the need for any additional styling tools. The styler’s bristles glide through hair with minimal resistance, delivering tug and pain free styling, alongside straight and shiny results.
Heating up in just 1-2 minutes, the brush boasts five varying temperature settings, which allow you to tailor your styling experience specifically to your hair type. The settings range from 150-230 °C, suitable for both fine and thick tresses. Automatically shutting off after 30 minutes, the styler is safe and simple to use.
Expect straight hair that is free from tangles and flyaways, whilst boasting a silky, shiny and satin-like finish.

Ideal for the whole family, the Wahl Colour Coded Cordless Clipper is a convenient rechargeable hair clipper equipped with a colour coded key to help identify yours and your loved ones preferred cutting length.

Powered by a Powerdrive™ motor for superior cutting action, the high performance cordless clipper utilises self-sharpening precision-ground blades to tackle even the thickest of hair, and has a soft touch grip for comfort and control. Colour coded for easy comb identification, the flexible and convenient hair clipper delivers 60 minutes of power on one full charge, and is equipped with 12 guide combs ranging from 0.8mm - 2.5mm.

Features:

product_description:
Baby Quasar's MD PLUS is an anti-ageing infrared light therapy device equipped with collagen-building and elastin-strengthening red light technology to promote smoother, younger-looking skin in as little as eight weeks.
Boasting four times the power of other light treatment devices, and proving 50% more powerful than the Baby Quasar PLUS, the pain-free facial device combines different shades of red and amber LED lights with infrared light to expertly firm skin and smoothen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles; medical science has proven that applying red and amber lights along with infrared light onto affected skin boosts the production of collagen and elastin. Its larger treatment head and 5mm LED lights enable quicker, more efficient treatment time with long-lasting results.
Completely safe, the light therapy treatment is dermatologist recommended and perfect for using at home with no reported side effects.

Parlux 3200 红色紧凑型电吹风，是美发沙龙中最受欢迎的一款，也适用于 日常家庭使用！ 配有专业交流电动机，能提供69立方米/小时的气流，这使得Parlux 3200 成为世界上最强大的紧凑型专业吹风机之一。

product_description:
Rediscover your skin's youthful capacity with the Tria Age-Defying Laser, a clinically proven, light-based, at-home skincare device that uses light technology to help improve skin's texture whilst combatting signs of ageing.
Created in collaboration with dermatologists and plastic surgeons, the anti-ageing device utilises the same technology as a professional clinic, allowing you to witness high performance results in the comfort of your own home. 
How Does it Work?
The device emits targeted beams of light that penetrate beneath the surface of skin to promote collagen and elastin production. Safe and effective for use on the forehead, cheeks and around the eyes, it delivers better anti-ageing results than any cream or serum, and will reduce the appearance of key signs of ageing, such as lines, stubborn wrinkles and discolouration; its patented technology keeps your collagen regenerating 24 hours a day. Promoting a more youthful-looking complexion in as little as two weeks, it will improve skin's clarity and bestow it with a natural glow, even when you're makeup-free.
name: Age-Defying Laser - Lilac

Sweep away tangles and frizz with the Corioliss Digital Hot Brush; an advanced, heated styling tool that delivers sleek and silky smooth results.  
Designed with ionic technology, it emits negative ions to combat frizz and enhance shine, with massaging bristles to effortlessly tackle knots. A variable temperature setting of up to 230°C allows superior results over regular brushing, working to relax kinks and effectively straighten hair in large sections. Tresses are left feeling soft and polished with gorgeous shine.

product_description:
Target wrinkles with the Baby Quasar Pure Rayz Anti-Ageing Light Therapy Device for Him; a scientifically advanced, anti-ageing system that’s powered by LED technology to help you achieve visibly younger looking skin.
One of the most powerful FDA-cleared light therapy tools available for home use, the handheld device emits completely harmless wavelengths of Red, Super Red, Amber and Infrared light that penetrate skin at different depths to help stimulate natural levels of collagen and elastin – the building blocks of supple, healthy-looking skin.     
Designed to treat the entire face, the gentle treatment effectively helps lift and smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines over time, without causing irritation, inflammation or skin sensitivity to sunlight.
Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the ergonomic and compact device is gentle enough for all skin types and easy to use from the comfort of your own home. Follow an eight week initial treatment and unveil a youthful looking complexion without fuss or stress, with only minimal touch-ups required for sustainable results.

Lightweight, portable and easy to use, it seeks to enhance the application of the serum and visibly reduce the look of wrinkles, lines and sagging. Skin feels softened, replenished and revitalised with redefined contours.

product_description:
Combat common skin concerns with the Talika Light Duo+ Anti-Ageing Program Treatment; an intelligent, anti-ageing device that delivers three different light therapy treatments in one compact design.
Inspired by aerospace research, the innovative tool utilises a unique combination of Light 590® Collagen Booster (orange) to improve elasticity and minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, Light 525® Skin Lightener (green) to diminish dark spots and pigmentation, and Light 630® Skin Soother (red) to reduce redness and inflammation.
With an ergonomic silhouette that fits perfectly in your hand, the Talika Light Duo+ features an optional ionotherapy and gentle vibration function for a more intense programme. Equipped with a timer that enables the device to start automatically upon contact with skin and stop once the treatment is finished. Powered by a rechargeable battery.
name: Light Duo+ Anti-Ageing Program Treatment Using Light

product_description:
Look after number one with FOREO's Holiday Pamper Yourself Essentials. Combining a facial cleansing device with a next generation eye massager, the set will leave you feeling squeaky clean and refreshed. Complete with a cooling gel eye mask.
FOREO IRIS™:
Designed with innovative Alternating T-Sonic™ technology, the eye massager features two modes: a gentle 'Pure Mode' to replicate the feeling of a manual massage and 'Spa Mode', which combines tapping and delicate pulsations for a professional beauty treatment experience. Crafted from premium, ultra-hygienic silicone that is gentle to the delicate eye contour area, the device prevents bacteria build-up and improves the absorption of skincare products, especially serum and cream. Reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, whilst smoothening crow's feet, fine lines and wrinkles for revitalised eyes. Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the IRIS™ ideal for travelling, so you can refresh eyes on the move. An advanced eye-brightening device with multiple intensity levels to suit individual needs and comfort requirements.
FOREO LUNA™ play:
An ultra-portable facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare for all skin types. The perfect introductory product for FOREO beginners, the travel-sized device is the smallest in the range (the same size as a cotton pad!) and offers up to 100 uses*. Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity, dual-zone range; its thicker touch points at the top perform an intense clean to help unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and dead skin, whilst softer, thinner points at the bottom gently cleanse sensitive or normal skin, and larger areas such as the cheeks. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. *Approximately 1-2 months when the device is used twice a day.
Gel Cooling Mask:
A cooling eye mask to help revitalise and rejuvenate tired, fatigued peepers.
name: Holiday Pamper Yourself Essentials - (IRIS, LUNA Play) Pearl Pink (Worth £153)

product_description:
Transform skin from head to toe The Full Monty 3-in-1 Total Skincare Gift Set from Magnitone London. The five-piece collection boasts the coveted Full Monty! Skincare Brush in a limited edition, purple hue, alongside three additional brush heads and a convenient shower hammock. Suitable for all skin types, the gift set guarantees to provide a thorough cleanse and exfoliation, as well as a salon-worthy pedicure.
The Full Monty 3-in-1 Total Skincare Brush - Limited Edition Amethyst
Tone and exfoliate skin with The Full Monty! 3-in-1 Total Skincare Brush, an innovative brush that deeply cleanses the face and body to remove dirt, make-up and excess oil. Powered by award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ technology, the device features a soft brush head that rotates at 15,000 pulsed oscillations per minute for a pore-penetrating action, revealing a smoother, refined texture.
Suitable for all skin types, the tool stimulates blood circulation to boost natural collagen production, effectively increasing suppleness and restoring a smoother appearance. With five cleansing modes including Body Exfoliation, Pedi-Buff and three facial settings, you can customise your daily routine to firm, tighten and reignite a radiant glow from head to toe. Fully waterproof and easy to clean, its compact, lightweight design makes the Full Monty! ideal for travelling so you can achieve visibly brighter, clearer and healthier skin on the move.
Pedi-Buff Brush Head
Get feet sandal-ready with the Pedi-Buff Brush Head; a powerful roller that provides a thorough pedicure to feet in need of pampering. Boasting diamond-tough dermabrasion crystals, the brush head effectively buffs dry, hard and rough skin from feet, including stubborn heels.  Expect the roller to reveal salon-soft skin instantly and effortlessly.
Luxury Silk Bliss Brush Head
The Silk Bliss Brush Head with SkinKind™ Bristles is the perfect choice for better skin hydration and superior pore purification. Featuring a soft head with feather-fine bristles, the brush creates a rich lather with your cleanser for a luxurious deep cleansing action. Compatible with all Magnitone Cleansing Brushes with a facial cleanse mode. Replace every 3 months.
The Stimulator Brush Head
The Stimulator Brush Head is a replacement brush head featuring soft, non-porous rubber-silicone nodules for a stimulating skin workout. Ideal for massaging in and improving absorption of serum, cream and oil products, the massage head boosts micro-circulation for a healthy-looking, radiant glow. Compatible with all Magnitone Cleansing Brushes with a facial cleanse mode. This massage head does not need to be replaced.
Shower Hammock
The Shower Hamomock stores your cleansing device and provides additional space for replacement brush heads. Both hygienic and practical, its simple, compact design is the perfect accessory for your bathroom.

product_description:

product_description:
Reach your personal workout and physique goals with the Slendertone Connect Abs Belt, a revolutionary, app-driven ab sculpting belt that actively tones your abdominal muscles whilst tracking your progress using a mobile app*.
Highly ergonomic and discreet under clothes, the unisex belt can be worn around the house, at work, or during activities for enhanced results. It connects to the specially designed app via Bluetooth Smart technology, and allows you to create a profile, set your goals and monitor your progress in real time, day by day. Offering programmes tailored to your specific goals and needs, it has five 6 week programmes to help increase your physical performance, improve your shape or tone your muscles even more. Designed to be used anywhere, by anyone, wearing the belt for just 30 minutes is equivalent to performing 202 sit ups. 
Expect toned abs and a sense of achievement when you track and smash your daily goals via the app.
*This app requires and Apple iPhone 4S or newer, Apple iPad 4th generation or newer, Apple iPod Touch, or Android 4.4 or newer.
name: Connect Abs Belt

product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.
name: ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush - Sunflower Yellow

product_description:
FOREO LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜男士洁面仪 适合忙碌的生活节奏，是旅行的完美伴侣。 这款便携式洁面工具通过一分钟的快速爽肤功效提供专业标准的护肤，让您无论在哪里都能尽享整套的护肤体验。
这款便携式洁面工具的设计采用 T-Sonic™ 技术，硅胶接触点可将 8,000 次声波脉动导入肌肤表层， 可有效清除 99.5% 的污垢和油脂，让肌肤细致平缓，看起来更健康。 灵活轻便，操作简单，硅胶"刷毛"超级卫生，可有效防止滋生细菌，以保持肌肤的清爽。
其创新的抗皱模式专门针对容易长皱纹的区域设计，清洁模式有助于贴合的舒缓剃须，最大限度地减少剃须刺激和损伤。 该设备为完全防水型设备，可在洗浴时安全使用，随附的旅行袋使保存更方便。
name: LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜男士洁面仪

product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Advance Light Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer - White from Parlux. Delivering superior performance, the Advance hair dryer aims to meet hairdressing standards to allow for a professional blow dry.
The hair dryer is host to Parlux’s innovative 2200 Watt ‘K-ADVANCE’ motor, which is powerful and durable; shortening the time it takes to dry hair, whilst extending the lifespan of the dryer.
Exceptionally lightweight, the hairdryer was crafted with the user in mind. The styling tool boasts a built-in silencer, ‘soft touch’ switches and anti-heat casing to ensure a more comfortable hold and drying experience overall. Utilising ionic ceramic technology, the dryer guarantees to leave hair healthy, shiny and static-free.
name: Advance Light Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer - White

product_description:
Rediscover a younger, firmer-looking complexion with the NuFACE Trinity and Trinity Wrinkle Reducer Gift Set. Combining a facial toning device with a wrinkle-banishing attachment, the duo will contribute to a smoother, lifted and younger-looking complexion with regular use.
Trinity Facial Toning Device:
An award-winning microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed to combat visible signs of ageing, the facial toning device works to stimulate both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a face lift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes. Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the toning device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, it will leave the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Trinity Wrinkle Attachment:
An FDA-cleared attachment that works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes, mouth and forehead. Compatible with your Trinity Facial Toning Device, the attachment is designed with an ergonomic shape to perfectly fit the contours of your face, and utilises photo light therapy to address wrinkles; it delivers a targeted combination of red, amber and infrared lights to help improve the appearance of skin. Its smart skin sensor enables lights when properly positioned on the face, and its three minute indicator and 21 minute auto-shut off make it easy to use. Regular and continued use is recommended for best results.
Gel Primer (59ml)
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.
name: Trinity and Trinity Wrinkle Reducer Gift Set

product_description: 使用清洁卫生的旋转刀片，每次使用后都能彻底洗净，非常适合修理多余的鼻毛、耳毛和眉毛。保护罩使刀头始终原地不动，这意味着所需的维护已最简化。

product_description:
Achieve soft, smooth skin with Tria Hair Removal Laser 4X, a clinically-proven, cordless hair removal device that works to reduce up to 70% of unwanted hair after just 2 treatments in as few as 3 months.
Dermatologist recommended, the innovative device safely and effectively removes hair with FDA-cleared laser technology; it utilises the same diode laser technology preferred by dermatologists to target and permanently disable the hair follicle for permanent results*, and has 3 times more hair eliminating energy than any other at home device.
Suitable for most hair and skin tones, the professional device is fast, powerful and easy to use; its interactive LED display guides you through each treatment for optimum results, and its longer battery life makes it ideal for covering multiple face and body parts during each treatment.
Expect soft, smooth skin with long term results.
After 2-3 months of treatment, hair growth will appear lighter and finer. After 3 months of treatment, hair follicles that have been deactivated will no longer grow hair. Continue to use as necessary for touch-ups.
Product Features:
Safe and easy hair removal.
Permanent results.
Clinically-proven.
FDA-cleared laser technology.
Cordless.
LED display.
30 minute battery life.
Easy grip handle.
name: Hair Removal Laser 4X - Graphite

product_description:
Brighten and even the appearance of your skin with Talika Pigment Control Anti-Dark Spots Cosmetic Instrument, an anti-ageing light therapy device that targets dark spots on the face, hands and décolleté to promote younger-looking skin with proven results.
Inspired by aerospace research, the patented device combines the emission of Green Light (525 nm) Wavelength with an Ionotherapy Function; the green light targets and regulates melanocyte activity whilst imperceptible ionic micro-currents stimulate skin to enhance the efficacy and penetration of traditional brightening creams. Delivering ultra-targeted action, the ergonomic tool helps to visibly reduce the size and intensity of dark spots and discolouration for brighter, more even toned skin.
Easy-to-use and automatically switches off after one minute.

Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

product_description:
Target wrinkles with the Baby Quasar Pure Rayz; a scientifically advanced, anti-ageing system that’s powered by LED light technology to help you achieve visibly younger looking skin.

Designed to treat the entire face, the gentle treatment effectively helps lift and smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines over time, without causing irritation, inflammation or skin sensitivity to sunlight.
Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the ergonomic and compact device is gentle enough for all skin types and easy to use from the comfort of your own home. Follow an eight week initial treatment and unveil a youthful looking complexion without fuss or stress, with only minimal touch-ups required for sustainable results.

Expertly calibrated, the plates seamlessly align for enhanced control with a flexible membrane allowing active movement of the plates along the central axis for effortless and smooth glide through the hair in one simple sweep.
A variable temperature control from 120°c to 235°c allows customisable regulation to create a variety of looks or suit any hair type. The built-in, dual-voltage circuitry means you can take it all over the world, and the kit is complete with a matching heat resistant pouch for convenient storage.

product_description:
Baby Quasar's PLUS is an anti-ageing infrared light therapy device equipped with collagen-building and elastin-strengthening red light technology to promote smoother, younger-looking skin in as little as eight weeks.
Boasting three to four times the power of other light treatment devices, the petite, pain-free facial device combines different shades of red and amber LED lights with infrared light to expertly firm skin and smoothen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with long-lasting results. Medical science has proven that applying red and amber lights along with infrared light onto affected skin boosts the production of collagen and elastin. Its smaller treatment head with 3mm LED lights make it convenient to use and highly portable when travelling.
Completely safe, the light therapy treatment is dermatologist recommended and perfect for using at home with no reported side effects.

product_description:
Rediscover a younger, firmer-looking complexion with the NuFACE Trinity in Icicle Blue. Combining a facial toning device with a skin-prepping primer, the duo will contribute to a smoother, lifted and younger-looking complexion with regular use.
Trinity Facial Toning Device - Icicle Blue
An award-winning microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed to combat visible signs of ageing, the device stimulates both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a facelift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes. Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, it leaves the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Gel Primer (59ml)
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.
name: Trinity - Icicle Blue

Reaching heat settings that range from 110° to 235°C in just 10-30 seconds, the straighteners can be used almost instantly and are suitable for all hair types and textures. The intelligent styler comprises an ergonomic design, allowing you to style locks with comfort and ease, whether that be creating luxurious curls or poker straight tresses. Creating styles with staying power, the straight iron features dual voltage, allowing you optimum styling wherever you may be.
name: Professional Styling Intelligent Digital Styler - Blush

product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.
name: ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush - Fuchsia

product_description:
Create beautiful curls with the Electric Head Jog Gold 25mm Titanium Waving Iron, a curling tong with slim, gold-titanium coated barrel to create smooth, shiny curls.
The 25mm barrel creates professional-looking, voluptuous curls, and its variable temperature control from 120°C to 230°C evenly distributes heat through the barrel for consistent results. High ionic output ensures heat is directed inside the hair, preserving hair's natural moisture and protecting the external structure from drying out.
The curling iron's safety cool tip keeps fingers protected during styling, and its 360° swivel 3 metre power cord makes for easy handling.
name: Head Jog Gold Titanium Waving Iron - 25mm

product_description:
使用 BaByliss Pro Brilliance 2100W Hair Dryer in cobalt blue，获得亮泽、无毛躁的效果。 这款吹风机兼具高速吹干效果和陶瓷离子调节，以打造柔软、易于打理的秀发。
凭借强大的交流电机和气流，秀发会被快速吹干！ 内部离子可调节和平滑秀发角质层，从而防止发丝凌乱。 拥有 3 档可变温度设置和 2 档风速设置，而额外的冷风按钮可实现发型持久定型。
这款吹风机由专业人士为专业人士设计，拥有时尚、优雅的设计，易于清洁和使用。 实现终极造型控制！ – N.P.

product_description:
Create an array of styles with the Tropical Burst Diva Professional Styling Rebel Feel The Heat Elite; a high-performance straightener arriving in a decorative floral print.
Effortlessly gliding through locks, the hair straighteners are crafted with floating Ceramic plates from Korea. The Argan infused plates are able to condition the hair whilst delivering evenly distributed heat. Allowing you to tailor your styling experience to your hair type, the styler arrives with variable heat controls, which range from 120°C to 220°C.
With the possibility of creating multiple styles, including straight hair, tight curls and loose waves, the straighteners guarantee to leave hair ultra-soft and enviably shiny.

product_description:
使用BaByliss Pro陶瓷热力卷发棒（19mm），打造蓬松丰盈的迷人小卷。  陶瓷加热棒可快速加热并将热度均匀地传递到每根秀发，25种不同的热度设置，充分满足各种发质对热度等级的需求。

product_description:
Introducing the next generation of dental care, FOREO's ISSA™ Pro Set helps you to achieve a brighter and whiter smile, whilst maintaining healthy gums and protecting from gum recession.
Featuring soft, gentle silicone bristles that resist bacteria build-up and channel 183 high-intensity pulsations per second, the toothbrush cleans the teeth and gums to removes plaque and prevent cavities, without scratching tooth enamel or damaging gums.
Fully waterproof and ultra-hygienic, the sleek, ergonomic ISSA™ has eight speed settings to suit individual needs and a 3D flexible brush head to reach every area of the mouth. Each 1 hour USB charge lasts up to 365 uses.

product_description:
为获得更清洁、更健康的肌肤，可尝试Rio迷你面部Cleanser，其柔和特性足以让其成为日常护肤产品的一部分。 适合敏感及油性、受损肌肤，这款强力、高效的清洁液有助于减少损伤，同时消除毛孔和污垢。
使用双速旋转刷深入和剧烈清洁肌肤，同时控制和操纵在整个面部运动。 设计坚固，具有简单的开关电源键，肌肤保养快速、简单、易于管理，从而获得容光焕发，神清气爽的肌肤。 C.R

Rediscover a younger, firmer-looking complexion with the NuFACE Trinity in Petal Pink. Combining a facial toning device with a skin-prepping primer, the duo will contribute to a smoother, lifted and younger-looking complexion with regular use.
Trinity Facial Toning Device - Petal Pink
An award-winning microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed to combat visible signs of ageing, the device stimulates both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a facelift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes. Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, it leaves the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Gel Primer (59ml)
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.
name: Trinity - Petal Pink

该旅行吹风机配备2100W、高气流和双电压电机，拥有令人难以置信的吹干能力，它具有创新的可折手柄，可轻松打包携带；完美适合旅行或外出。 它的三档速度范围和温度设置为您提供造型通用性，而其冷风喷口意味着为您的发型定型，同时打造镜面反射光泽。 为增强光泽，吹风机陶瓷格栅加入角蛋白和摩洛哥坚果油；这种混合物将增强头发的自然亮泽，获得健康、光滑效果。 配有沙龙长度3米线缆。 - K.N.

Utilising ionic ceramic technology, the dryer guarantees to leave hair healthy, shiny and static-free.

product_description:
Treat acne with the Baby Quasar MD Blue Light Therapy Device; a scientifically advanced, prescription-strength treatment that’s powered by innovative LED light technology to help you achieve visibly clearer skin.  
Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the skincare device is safe and easy to use, utilising intelligent light wavelengths to treat the root source of spots and breakouts.
Crafted from high quality anodised aluminium with an intelligent LED configuration, the high spectrum blue light penetrates skin at a deeper level, seeking to kill the infectious bacteria that causes excess sebum production, acne and inflammation.
gentle enough for all skin types, the Quasar MD Blue device has a larger head than the Baby Blue device so you can treat a larger area and cut down your overall treatment time. A pain free and effective acne treatment suitable for teens and adults alike to help you regain confidence and attain a clear complexion.

Simultaneously straightening and brushing hair, the styler boasts a unique combination of hot and cool bristles, hot to relax and straighten the hair, whilst the cool bristles lock the style into place to produce long-lasting results.
The hot, ceramic bristles are infused with Macadamia, Argan Oil and Keratin, which combine to combat unwanted frizz and static, as well as leaving hair glossy. Not just straightening locks, the styling brush is crafted with grooves to the underside, which are able to add soft curls and flicks to hair.
Suitable for all hair types and textures, the styling tool boasts variable heat settings ranging from 110° to 200°C, allowing you to style at a temperature tailored to your tresses. Complete with dual voltage, the essential Speed Brush Pro will work just as effectively whilst you're on-the-go.

Comfortable to hold and easy to control, the clipper is great for full head cuts, or for precision trimming around the ears, sideburns and neckline. Complete with an LED charging indicator and premium accessories.

The Kit Contains:
Clipper, hard storage case, cape, scissors and barber comb, 10 guide combs

product_description:
Target wrinkles with the Baby Quasar Pure Rayz Anti-Ageing Light Therapy Device for Him; a scientifically advanced, anti-ageing system that’s powered by LED technology to help you achieve visibly younger looking skin.
One of the most powerful FDA-cleared light therapy tools available for home use, the handheld device emits completely harmless wavelengths of Red, Super Red, Amber and Infrared light that penetrate skin at different depths to help stimulate natural levels of collagen and elastin – the building blocks of supple, healthy-looking skin.     
Designed to treat the entire face, the gentle treatment effectively helps lift and smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines over time, without causing irritation, inflammation or skin sensitivity to sunlight.
Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the ergonomic and compact device is gentle enough for all skin types and easy to use from the comfort of your own home. Follow an eight week initial treatment and unveil a youthful looking complexion without fuss or stress, with only minimal touch-ups required for sustainable results.

Clinically proven and dermatologically tested, the skincare device is safe and easy to use, utilising intelligent light wavelengths to treat the root source of spots and breakouts.
Set in an ergonomically designed plastic shell, on one side the high spectrum Blue LED's activate chemicals that occur naturally in skin, which then work to kill the bacteria that cause blemishes and acne. On the flip side, the healing Red LED's target healthy hair follicles and help minimise the look of inflammation, redness and scarring.
Free from any negative side effects and gentle enough for all skin types, the Baby Quasar Clear Rayz is a pain free and effective acne treatment suitable for teens and adults alike to help you regain confidence and attain a clear complexion.

Engineered for ease, the trimmer boasts high-grade Japanese steel blades at a unique, ultra-sharp cutting angle, which glide through hair for smooth and effortlessly cutting. The Super Clipper can trim hair at a variety of lengths and styles; from a grade zero to grade eight.

product_description:
使用 BaByliss For Men Super Stubble Trimmer，控制下午 5 点重新长出的胡须。这是一款高级防水剃须刀，具备 24 个超精确长度设置，有助于保持理想的胡须造型。
采用锂离子技术提供电力，确保持续性能。即使在低电量时，电化学锐化刀片和电动长度控制也可让您专业地修剪和刮胡子，而浮动的刀头可跟随面部形状，实现出色的舒适性和精确度。 LED 显示屏可轻松显示长度设置和电量水平。
修剪器还具备长度记忆设置；保存上一次使用的设置，这样就能重复获得您的专属特色妆容。 - K.N
100% 防水 - 可放在水龙头下清洗或在淋浴时使用。
name: For Men Super Stubble Trimmer - Black

product_description:
Achieve salon-worthy results with the Rapida3700PRO Dryer from Diva Professional Styling. Harnessing 15% more power than the previous model, the 3700PRO is equipped with 2200 watts of power and a long life AC motor, drying hair quickly, evenly and effectively.
The durable hairdryer arrives with four heat settings reaching a maximum heat of 110°C, allowing you to choose an ideal temperature for your hair type. The coldest setting is perfect for locking styles into place. Multiple heat settings and two speed settings help to create a unique styling experience, tailored to you.
name: Professional Styling Rapida3700PRO Dryer - Magenta

product_description:
Stay perfectly groomed with the Wahl Action Pro Clipper, a rechargeable hair clipper with complimentary ear and nose trimmer.
Designed to expertly cut hair, the cordless device allows for flexible movement when cutting, and comes with rinseable blades for a fresh, hygienic trim each time. The trimmer lasts up to 60 minutes when fully charged, but can also be used with a cord if power starts to run low. The powerful tool professionally cuts hair into shape and the additional nose and ear trimmer ensures you looked perfectly groomed all-over.
Fitted with an intelligent LED display light for charging visibilty.
The Kit Contains:
Clipper, 8 guides combs, storage case, scissors, barber comb, oil and cleaning brush.
name: Action Pro Clipper

product_description:
使用Corioliss C3 Gold Paisley Hair Straightener来打造完美发型。 该电夹板具有超长的凭借超长的Titanium板，可以毫不费力地在您的秀发之间滑过，同时其负离子技术也可以消除静电，让秀发如丝绸般柔软。
本产品适合所有发质类型使用，LED将温度控制在135-235℃之间，可以让您找到完全适合发质和发型的温度。   无论是拉直秀发，还是增添卷发，该产品都可以保证效果持久。同时在使用三十分钟后，会自动转为睡眠模式。从而您可以安心出门，不用担心电夹板是否还在工作中。 - L.M.产品特色：
name: C3 Gold Paisley Hair Straightener

product_description:
Braun 系列5 5040S 乾濕兩用剃須刀讓您享受舒適親膚剃須體驗，即使最難接觸的部位也一樣輕鬆駕馭。採用超級提拉和剃須技術，第一個刀片提拉，第二個刀片剃須，而融合的FlexMotionTec 技術有利於在最大程度上增加皮膚接觸面。而彈出的箔片修剪器可剃除鬍子和鬢角，剃須刀可以連接線纜使用，也可以無繩使用。充電一小時即可無繩使用45 分鐘，快充5 分鐘即可提供一次剃須所需的電量。 - LM 
 特點：
name: 系列 5 5040S 干湿两用剃须刀

product_description: Achieve effortless beach-inspired locks with the T3 Tousled Waves Tapered Barrel attachment, compatible with the T3 Twirl and Whirl curling irons. Featuring a Tourmaline and Ceramic 1.25"-0.75" coated barrel to prevent frizz and maximize shine, the innovative interchangeable styling tool allows for endless looks with minimal heat damage. Simply click in your chosen barrel and get curling for gorgeous, salon-perfect results.
name: Tousled Waves Tapered Barrel Curling Iron

product_description:
Braun SE3270 腿部身體脫毛器可讓您擁有絲般光滑的肌膚，效果長達數週。本品採用20 夾輪系統，採用SoftLift 細軟毛髮提拉系統，可將毛髮拉直並導入夾輪，同時SmartLight 還可讓您看到最細微的毛髮。本品採用兩檔速度設置，可洗刀頭，本品專為乾燥脫毛設計，還配備各種替換刀頭，身體各個部位均可輕鬆獲得完美的脫毛效果。 - LM 
 特點：
name: SE3270 腿部和身体脱毛器

product_description:
这款温和的 Rio Sonicleanse 洁面器利用高频声波帮助对抗瑕疵、出油、毛孔堵塞和皮肤干斑，并深入去除死皮，焕活肌肤。
Rio Sonicleanse 适合所有肌肤类型，可日常使用，非常方便。配备实用底座，让设备保持理想状态。
name: Sonicleanse 声波焕肤洁面器

product_description:
Catering specifically for babies aged 0-4 years, FOREO's ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush allows a safe, fun and healthy brushing routine and promotes stronger, healthier gums.
Combining non-abrasive, super-soft silicone bristles with Sonic Pulse Technology, the innovative, colourful device features two modes: a 'Brush' setting to cleanse delicate teeth and gums, and a 'Massage' option that relieves tenderness and teething pain with its gentle vibrations.
Lightweight and ergonomic for a non-slip, comfortable grip, the electric toothbrush has been crafted from bacteria-resistant, food-grade silicone for ultimate hygiene, whilst its encased one-piece design has no detachable parts or sharp edges for superior safety.
An integrated timer indicates when it is time to move to a different section of the mouth, and rewarding Smile Helpers ('Glee' and 'Glum') light up to track brushing time; encouraging even the youngest users to develop good dental care habits. Waterproof and dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.
name: ISSA™ mikro Toothbrush - Kiwi
